text: @GovernorPataki @DDbeyork @NYGovCuomo I hope there is some serious audit over the Covid19 data. Numbers of Deaths published by leftist-oriented governments are five times highter than conservative-oriented governments. Thats some serious discrepancy. I hope there is nothing to do with leftist passing emercy bills
